file_content.text: I'll be safe here until reinforcements arrive. Thank you.
Stop Krannus before he detonates the power core--for all our sakes.
If you won't help me, the least you can do is stop Krannus! Go!
I'm right behind you.
Doctor Gantrell, I presume.
You arrived just in time. That beast was about to eat me alive.
I've got to stop the Imperials. Where did they go?
Tell me where Krannus went.
You look like you've been tortured.
Are you hurt?
Executor Krannus. First he carved out my tracking chip. Then he forced me to give him the codes to the security vault.
That thing may have scared you, but it wasn't a big deal for me.
Nothing I couldn't handle.
I'm glad to hear it, because we have a much larger problem.
Krannus took the key to the prison's power core. He intends to destroy it! Do you have any idea what that means?
I'm not going to let Krannus reach the core.
Don't worry. I'll stop him.
The consequences if he succeeds are unfathomable.
You're the expert on the power core, doctor.
Why don't you tell me?
Yes. He'll wipe out all life on Belsavis.
Planet-wide extinction.
It's far, far worse than that.
The power core derives energy from hyperspace itself. A detonation will send shock waves at lightspeed. Belsavis's destruction is only the beginning.
The shock waves will annihilate this entire system--and consume the ones adjacent to it. Trillions will die!
Krannus can't be too far ahead. I'll stop him before he reaches the core.
I won't let that happen.
You know a lot. I don't understand why Krannus didn't kill you.
Why were you left here?
He thought it would be more amusing to let the creatures down here devour me.
You coward! You gave Krannus everything he needs to kill us all!
This is your fault!
He tortured me!
Krannus has the key, and he's headed for the power core. That's all I care about.
It doesn't matter now.
You knew trillions of lives were at stake. You shouldn't have talked!
You should have resisted.
I'm not like you. I'm just a man.
Please, don't leave me. Seal me inside one of the empty vaults until the Republic regains control.
Stick close. I'll get you to safety.
I'll take you there now.
No wonder Krannus didn't kill you. He was hoping you would delay me.
You're going to slow me down.
Well, it's working. He's getting away.
Then you'd better make up your mind fast.
Don't take the bait. Leave him.
The doctor is one life against trillions. It's an easy choice.
Krannus = getting away // Jedi + T7 = catch him now?
Stopping Krannus is the only thing that matters.
We don't have time.
But... you're a Jedi! You can't just leave me here to die!
I can't put your life above a trillion others. I'm sorry.
Too many lives are at stake.
Follow me. Let's make this quick.
I won't abandon you.
Thank you. Head to the empty containment vault. I'll be right behind.
All this time you spent complaining could have been spent making your way to the vault.
Quit crying and save yourself.
You put trillions of lives in danger to save yourself. Now you pay for your selfishness.
Idiot! I'm leaving you here.
Fine. Leave me here to fend for myself. But if I die, it's on your head!
No--please!
Doctor Gantrell = victim // Execution = too harsh
Might have been better to take him alive. He could've been put on trial.
Krannus won't go down so easily.
Were you always this cruel, and I just didn't see it? Or is the Emperor still inside your head, somewhere?
Let's all take a deep breath. Things are getting a little out of hand.
